About.text1: Elisof is a global export-import company specializing in clothing and textiles. It sources, manufactures, and distributes high-quality apparel worldwide, ensuring premium fabrics, ethical production, and seamless logistics. With a strong supply chain, Elisof connects fashion brands to global markets efficiently.

HomeAbout.PotteryArt: Attention to everyone who is interested in pottery art
HomeAbout.Text1: We have been engaged in pottery art for 15 years
HomeAbout.Text2: Samples created by our craftsmen can be seen in tourist centers of various regions of Uzbekistan and, of course, in the city of Tashkent.
HomeAbout.Text3: Our goal is to constantly develop the cultural heritage and craft traditions of Uzbekistan!
HomeAbout.Text4: So subscribe now to join us.

AboutOne.title: Samples
AboutOne.text: Samples created by our masters can be seen in tourist centers of various regions of Uzbekistan and, course, in the city of Tashkent.

AboutTwo.title: Bright gallery
AboutTwo.text: Let's talk about the activities of Bright Gallery We have been engaged in pottery art for 15 years.

AboutThree.title: Our goal
AboutThree.text: Our goal is to constantly develop the cultural heritage and craft traditions of Uzbekistan!

AboutOne.text: He was born in 1989 in  the Gizhdivon district of Bukhara region. He began studying pottery in the 3rd grade, from the 4th grade he participated in regional and city competitions and achieved high results until he graduated from school

AboutTwo.text: After graduating from school, he studied at the College of Art and Design in Tashkent. He was recognized as the winner in the category best master of the year at the Republican Olympiad

AboutThree.text: He was accepted to study at the Institute of Painting and Design named after Kamoliddin Bekhzod on a general basis. By 2024, he will participate in city, republican and international competitions and exhibitions, achieving high results.

RTwo.name: Address
RTwo.value: Tashkent city park, in front of Tashkent city mall
